mapper.update: update family_info set family_name = #{familyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor_id = #{floorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, building_name = #{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_detail = #{buildingDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grid_id = #{gridId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grid_name = #{gridName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, family_name, floor_id, floor, building_id, building_name, building_detail, grid_id, grid_name from family_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, family_name, floor_id, floor, building_id, building_name, building_detail, grid_id, grid_name from family_info
